short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Allows to assign color to tags in Workflowy

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: This extension allows the user to add colour to worKflowy tags. You can assign foreground and background colors to the label itself, the text or both. Tags and colors can be edited via the settings.
